hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa`id Al-Khudri:The Prophet (ﷺ) was more shy than a virgin in her separate room. And if he saw a thing which he disliked, we would recognize that (feeling) in his face

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يُوَاجِهِ النَّاسَ بِالْعِتَابِ
chapter.eng-name: Whoever did not admonish people in their faces
